infotexts.entitydescription.thal_sprinkler: Sprays water onto an area to extinguish fires or water plants. Leaving it running for a ridiculously long time may cause puddles. Or worse.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_trashcan: Trash can used for disposal of small or medium sized items. Wire the trigger_out pin to a trash chute, and link the chute to the can for the item to be transported.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_blastdoor: Slower, heavily armored sliding door incapable of being levered open or shredded by monsters. Does not have a button variant due to impractical nature.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_glassdoor: Slightly weaker, completely transparent door made entirely of a plexiglass-based metamaterial.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_glassdoorwbuttons: Slightly weaker, completely transparent door made entirely of a plexiglass-based metamaterial. Has integrated buttons.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_glasshatch: Slightly weaker, completely transparent hatch made entirely of a plexiglass-based metamaterial.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_glasshatchwbutton: Slightly weaker, completely transparent hatch made entirely of a plexiglass-based metamaterial. Has integrated buttons.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_oxygendock: A dock able to hold three oxygen tanks or welding tanks. Can be linked to oxygen generators to refill any contained o2 tanks, so long as the oxygen is flowing. Only has the vent tag for outpost compatibility; Does not emit oxygen into hull.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_shuttervent: A vent capable of having its oxygen flow turned on/off through wiring or with a wrench. Can also have things stored inside of it with a wrench, though a sharp eye will notice the jutting cover.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_vacuum: Machine capable of pulling the oxygen out of a room when properly powered and activated. Pulls out slightly less oxygen than an artifact. Ideal for fires and suffocating lifeforms.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_vendingmachine: Dispenses whatever is placed inside of it. Requires a crowbar to open, and costs money to refill.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_thalamuseye: Cosmetic Thalamus Eye that looks around and makes squishy noises. Can be destroyed.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_thalamusseeds: Cosmetic Thalamus Seeds. Non-interactive. Look like teeth.
